subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Delgado has already done serious damage to the arms and psyches of the Dodgers. Derek Lowe expressed disgust with the pronounced shift that his team used against Delgado on Wednesday.
snippet: Carlos Delgado has already done serious damage to the arms and psyches of the Dodgers. Derek Lowe expressed disgust with the pronounced shift that his team used against Delgado on Wednesday.
